title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 13.1 - Amounts included in cost of real estate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 13.1 - Amounts included in cost of real estate

State Regulations

The cost involved in a direct purchase or acquisition by
condemnation proceeding of real estate, shall include not only the amount of
the award but all incidental charges of condemnation proceeding other than
legal or other service furnished by State officers in the performance of their
official duties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
13.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
